name: Yoga Blocks 2 Pack, 3"x6"x9" EVA Foam Yoga Block Supportive, Non-Slip Exercise Blocks, Yoga Accessories for Pilates, Meditation, Balance, Stretching and Deep Poses
short_description: 【Premium Quality】Our yoga blocks are made of high-quality EVA foam, which is durable, lightweight, and has good resilience. The surface is smooth and has a non-slip design, providing a comfortable and stable support for your yoga practice.

【Versatile Use】Our yoga blocks are perfect for various yoga poses, such as supporting your knees during deep squats, providing stability for your shoulders during bridge poses, and helping you deepen your stretches. They can also be used as chair cushions, footrests, and props for meditation and relaxation.

【Ergonomic Design】Our yoga blocks are designed with an ergonomic shape that fits the contours of your body. The curved edges provide a comfortable grip and prevent slipping, allowing you to maintain your balance and stability throughout your practice.

【Easy to Carry】Our yoga blocks are lightweight and portable, making them easy to carry to your yoga classes, home workouts, or travel. They come with a convenient carrying strap, so you can easily take them with you wherever you go.
【Multiple Colors】Our yoga blocks come in a variety of colors, including pink, purple, Magenta, allowing you to choose the block that best complements your personal style and preferences.
product_description: This yoga block set is made of high-density Eva foam, which is soft, lightweight, and has excellent resilience. The surface of the yoga block is smooth and non-slip, providing a comfortable and stable support for your yoga practice. The yoga block set includes two blocks, each measuring 3 inches in height, 6 inches in width, and 9 inches in length. The blocks are suitable for various yoga poses and exercises, such as stretching, balancing, and supporting your body during deep stretches. The blocks are also great for Pilates, weightlifting, crossfit, dance, gymnastics, and other fitness activities. The blocks are easy to clean and store, and can be used repeatedly for many years.

Portable and Durable - These lightweight and supportive foam blocks are constructed of a durable foam. They are light enough to carry to yoga classes or around the home yet strong enough for daily poses.

Non-Slip - The beveled edges with the non-slip surface are designed for a more secure grip. Our yoga props are ideal for all sorts of poses as well as general floor stretches or incorporating with Pilates.
